0.1.name: wordpress/embed-wistia-vid
0.1.description:
To use Plugin install and then on page you wish to place the Wistia Vid put shortcode [wistiavid id=xxxxx] xxxxx being the Wistia Video ID, this can be found in the URL of the video on Wistia. Eg. http://smallbusinesswebsites.wistia.com/medias/q509p384zl The ID of this video is q509p384zl therefore the shortcode for the video is [wistiavid id=q509p384zl] as found on this page: http://www.smallbusinesswebsites.org.au/about-us/

Thanks

Craig Lambie Developer

Why I did this? The Wistia Plugin caused me great pains. I tried a few other code snippet plugins, but they then caused issues with "other" plugins.

Known issues: - "Add this" plugin can cause an error with conflicts in Jquery or Wistia JS files http://wordpress.org/
